name: Peter Kovacs
description: I am a dedicated and enthusiastic software developer with a strong foundation in a variety of technologies. My expertise lies in crafting efficient and robust solutions using TypeScript and C#, among other tools. Throughout my journey, I have honed my skills through hands-on experience and a deep passion for creating impactful applications.

items.name: Web Primer Shell
items.description: A developer-friendly web application template suitable for a wide spectrum of full-stack projects, offering a blend of contemporary tools and solutions to cater to both straightforward and intricate development needs.

items.name: LoL Scan API
items.description: An application programming interface for tracking League of Legends data, developed with tRPC, leveraging fundamental web-scraping techniques.

items.name: Node Primer Shell
items.description: A Node.js application template to start any new project quickly and easily, including a basic application structure with TypeScript and Prettier configurations.

items.name: CC Toolset
